## Summary

Describe what changed and why.

## Linked Issues

Use GitHub close keywords when applicable (example: `Closes #123`).

## Documentation Impact (Required)

Fill these machine-readable fields for automation:

DOCS_IMPACT: required
DOCS_IMPACT_NOTE: updated docs for API/contract changes
DOC_CHANGELOG: one-line summary for documentation changelog

If no docs update is required, use:

DOCS_IMPACT: none
DOCS_IMPACT_NOTE: explain why docs are not required for this change
DOC_CHANGELOG: no public interface impact

## Validation

- [ ] I ran relevant tests/lint checks for this change.
- [ ] I updated docs (`README.md` or `apps/docs/docs/*`) when behavior/interfaces changed.
- [ ] I added FOLLOWUP lines if additional issues should be auto-created after merge.
